Alarms.MOPMessage: LO Master Pump Inlet press high
Alarms.Description: Lubrication oil inlet pressure is high

Alarms.MOPMessage: LO Master Pump Inlet press shutdown level
Alarms.Description: Lubrication oil inlet pressure is below shutdown level
LO temp is higher than alarm limit.

Alarms.MOPMessage: LO Slave Pump Inlet press shutdown level
